replies.message: https://www.facebook.com/Mulheres.Brasileiras.Lindas.2015

These Eminem fans are just so unbelievable. All I ever see flooded in the comment section is "#RapGod", best rapper ever, lil wayne should work at McDonalds, some shitty sketch drawing with Eminem or his name, "Like if you've seen this movie (8 Mile)". FUCK OFF. You don't know shit about Eminem let alone rap. If you're going to state stuff like this then listen to the best and biggest (Nas, Biggie etc.) and then voice your opinion. But in the meanwhile shut the fuck up. The majority of you people probably don't know who Proof is and listen to these new shitty songs he creates like Not Afraid. Listen to the Marshall Mathers LP because that was arguably one of the best albums ever.
Well said amar
Like
^well u cant expect to write about other rappers here because its  a FUCKING EMINEM PAGE retard

Maybe not other rappers but why don't people at least mention Proof or Dre or D12? Eminem has involvement within all three of those and I hear nothing. And I'm telling right now people. Not Afraid is a shit song, don't why people go on about it so much when it's just trash. I'd rather listen to any song from the SSLP, MMLP, Encore, The Eminem Show or Relapse.

Amar, you're preaching to the wrong page lol. Eminem has one 6 best rap album awards out of 8 albums. It's a fact that he is the best, not just people's opinion like your saying with Biggie and nas even tho they were good rappers they didn't win that many awards
the r the same age how can pac  call EM son

Don't get me wrong, he's my favourite because of his old shit but when these fake fans that claim he's the best come in when in reality 90% of them have listened to no one else, it pisses me off. And if you are going to claim he's the best at least present in some other way instead of constantly mentioning Iggy Azalea, Lil Wayne, Rap God... jesus christ at least quote some good old songs. Those were the best.
Lol
FUCK the FUCK OFF Amar Jak!
Your on Eminems page telling people not to show Eminem love? What the hell
His greatest song ever!

I'm sure you guys don't know this song without looking it up;  this is what made him.  Number 1 song in my book.
Infinite ^
